column1: described in the schedule to the plaint. In that plaint, there were only three

The  petitioner,  at  the  time  of  the  preliminary  survey,  undisputedly  claimed
her  house.    The  commissioner  has  reported  that  Lot  4  of  the  preliminary
plan  is  in  the  extent  of  1  rood  and  five  perches  with  clear  boundaries,  and
the house is situated by the side of the access road.  Commissioner further

the following plantation. The petitioner made claims before the surveyor, and
